# <a name="add-a-birthday-calendar-in-outlookcom"></a><span data-ttu-id="85cfa-102">Sünnipäeva kalendri lisamine Outlook.com-i</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85cfa-102">Add a birthday calendar in Outlook.com</span></span>

1. <span data-ttu-id="85cfa-103">Lehe allosas valige ikooni kalender</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85cfa-103">At the bottom of the page, select the calendar icon</span></span> <img src='data:image/png;base64,' /> <span data-ttu-id="85cfa-104">[avage Kalender](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85cfa-104">to [go to Calendar](https://outlook.live.com/mail/calendar).</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="85cfa-105">Vasakus paanis Paremklõpsake **sünnipäevad** ja valige **Uus sünnipäev**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85cfa-105">In the left pane, right-click **Birthdays** and select **New birthday**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="85cfa-106">Sisestage inimese nimi ja sünnikuupäev ja valige **Loo**.</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85cfa-106">Enter the person's name and birth date, and select **Create**.</span></span>
1. <span data-ttu-id="85cfa-107">Valige **Sünnipäevakalender lülitab meeldetuletused sisse ja välja** .</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85cfa-107">Select the **Birthday** calendar to toggle reminders on and off.</span></span>

<span data-ttu-id="85cfa-108">Lisateavet [lisamise või eemaldamise sünnipäev ja puhkus kalendreid](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span><span class="sxs-lookup"><span data-stu-id="85cfa-108">Learn more about [adding or removing birthday and holiday calendars](https://support.office.com/article/b8e636da-fda8-413f-940e-68396efa49a6?wt.mc_id=Office_Outlook_com_Alchemy).</span></span>
